maintainer.name: Zoltan Puskas
maintainer.description: Proxied maintainer. Assign bugs to him.

use.flag: Use inkscape to convert SVG. Disable to use gnome-base/librsvg instead.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: dbaltex is an opensource DocBook to LaTeX publishing software that originally started as DB2LaTeX clone, but now is more feature rich and easier to use.
